'Dark Tranquillity' is a Swedish melodic death metal band from
Gothenburg. They are one of the longest-standing bands from the original
Gothenburg metal scene, and are one of the most integral pioneers of the melodic
death metal genre of music.
categories: Swedish melodic death metal musical groups
